bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Experiment counts in groups is reporting wrong numbers. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Check the experiment group's overview on the dashboard. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The annotation should report the correct counts of the experiments under a group.
